subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: For the second game in a row, the Kings beat the Devils in overtime to win their 10th straight road game this postseason and take a 2-0 lead in the Stanley Cup finals.
snippet: For the second game in a row, the Kings beat the Devils in overtime to win their 10th straight road game this postseason and take a 2-0 lead in the Stanley Cup finals.
